pages.text: The spirits usually inhabit an animal's body, allowing them to resist essence decay for the most part. Familiars provide buffs, but may also actively protect the summoner.
Enterprising summoners have found a way to bind familiars into jewelry that passively applies their buff, the $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_familiar_ring)Familiar Ring$().

pages.title: Trading Familiars
pages.text: Familiars can be easily traded when in a $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_familiar_ring)Familiar Ring$(). When released, the spirit will recognize the person releasing them as their new master.
